news.title: New California Bar Study Finds Racial Disparities in Lawyer Discipline
news.description: The study revealed significant inequities in areas such as probationary discipline and disbarment, with the greatest disparities occurring between black and white male lawyers.

news.title: How Does a Lawyer Get Competent in Tech? I Asked Twitter and Got 100+ Answers
news.description: Advice to lawyers seeking a greater level of tech literacy included to begin exploring tech topics they are curious about, and to learn to communicate well with tech professionals.

news.title: Why Are Experienced Women Lawyers Leaving BigLaw? Survey Looks for Answers and Finds Big Disparities
news.description: The data indicates stark differences in women lawyers’ access to specific opportunities that would lend themselves to career success, and an alarmingly high rate of sexual harassment.

news.title: The Insider’s View On LegalTech VC Funding
news.description: A legal tech business owner describes the current venture capital funding landscape, and offers their story as an example of how legal tech is becoming integral to the legal industry.
